name: Doubles: Drinking Game for Two
description:
Finally, a Drinking Game designed for Only 2 People!

We've got categories that are perfect for a couple in love, and categories for those who are just friends!

Which One of You Has the Most Sexual Partners?
Who Can Name the Most Nicolas Cage Movies to Avoid Drinking?
Would You Plan a Heist with Your Significant Other?

Well, these are the kinds of things you'll be finding out when you play a round of Doubles! Oh, and you'll be drinking your fair share as well...

Check it out and let us know what you think at drinkotron.com
